charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1101_0100_2:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] saw Hilbert
while walking through the city.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1101_0200_2:
Hilbert was surrounded by all sorts of Pokémon,
including his partner, Oshawott.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0401_0400_1:
Whoa! [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I didn’t see you there!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0402_0600_1:
Whoa! [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I didn’t see you there!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_0700_1:
Ha ha, yeah. I was wondering what I was going
to do with all these.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_0800_1:
Before I realized it, these Pokémon were
following me.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_0900_1: There aren’t any wild Pokémon on Pasio, right?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_1000_1:
If that’s true, there must be a lot of Trainers out
there looking for their Pokémon right now.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_1100_1:
Do you think you could help me find all of their
Trainers, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0302_1400_1:
No way!
That’s way too much trouble!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0402_1500_1:
Whoa, Oshawott! Calm down!
Sorry, I guess he wants you to help us out.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0402_1600_1:
You’ll help me? Really?
Thanks so much! I really appreciate it!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_1700_1:
Let’s first ask around to every Trainer we
come across.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_1800_1: Maybe we can find some clues that way!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_1900_1:
I can’t thank you enough! We were able to get
all those Pokémon back to their Trainers,
thanks to you!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_2000_1:
But I wonder why they got separated to
begin with? They all mentioned seeing
some suspicious Trainers going around.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0301_2100_1:
It might be those knuckleheads with
the masks.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0401_2200_1:
Oh, you may be right.
I didn’t think of that possibility.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0302_2300_1: Maybe there are bad Trainers about?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0402_2400_1:
Oh, you may be right.
I didn’t think of that possibility.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_2500_1:
If that’s the case, maybe it was for the best that
those Pokémon gathered around me.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_2600_1:
I’ve been to all sorts of regions, training my
Pokémon and testing my abilities.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_2700_1:
Oshawott looks like he wants to get stronger,
as well.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_2800_1: I’ve had Oshawott since he was an Egg.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_2900_1:
I found that Egg a while back, after I had left a
Samurott I had at a Pokémon Day Care.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3000_1:
I think he wants to be like my Samurott.
I can’t blame him. Samurott is really strong.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3100_1:
I want to help Oshawott and make his dream to
become a strong Samurott come true.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3200_1:
Seeing those Pokémon and Trainers separated from
each other got me thinking.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3300_1:
Trainers and Pokémon don’t really do well on their
own, do they?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3400_1: Ah, sorry. Guess I’m just starting to ramble now.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3500_1:
You’re such a good listener that I got
carried away.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3600_1: That reminds me. You want to be stronger, right?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0401_3800_1:
Then it might be a good thing 
that we teamed up!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0402_4000_1:
Then it might be a good thing 
that we teamed up!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_4100_1: I think we’re on the same wavelength!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_4200_1:
I’m sure we’ll be tagging along at least until
Oshawott reaches his full potential.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_4300_1:
I’m with you not only as your teammate
but also as a friend and rival!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_1201_0100_1:
Hey, Hilbert! How’s your exploration of
Pasio going?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_1201_0200_1:
Well, we’ve been all over, and the highlight has
been getting to battle all kinds of sync pairs.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_1201_0300_1:
Oh, if that’s the case, then you should battle me!
I’ll check just how strong you really are.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_1201_0400_1: All right then, Brendan! Let’s battle!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_0101_0100_1: You think you can handle my Grovyle?!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_0101_0200_1:
Make one mistake against us, and it’ll be all over
for you!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_0501_0100_1: Ouch! I had no idea anybody could battle like that.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_0501_0200_1:
I thought I was in trouble there. If it hadn’t been
for Oshawott’s quick thinking, you’d have had us.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_0501_0300_1:
Sounds like your Pokémon’s getting stronger, too,
huh? We’ve gotta make sure we as Trainers can
keep up with them!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_0501_0400_1: O-Oshawott?! Is this what they call Evolution?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_0501_0500_1:
I was pretty surprised in that last battle, too!
I didn’t realize how strong we had gotten!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_1201_0100_1:
Hey, Hilbert. I’ve been hearing a lot about how
well you’ve been doing here.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_1201_0200_1:
Thanks! My Dewott’s at peak performance right
now! Something tells me it might be about time
for Evolution...
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_1201_0300_1:
Well, in that case, I would definitely like to battle
you. What do you say?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_1201_0400_1:
You got it! I’m always ready for an intense
Pokémon battle!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_0101_0100_1: All right—it’s time to reach new heights in battle!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_0101_0200_1:
I’m sure you can become even stronger than
you already are!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_0501_0100_1:
You got me... You certainly are strong! 
I even felt that it might be time for Evolution.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_0501_0200_1:
Thanks, Cheren! You came along just to help us
with our Evolution, huh?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_0501_0300_1:
Perhaps I did. It was not my intention to
lose, though.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_0501_0500_1:
Ooh, I can’t wait to see what you look like once
you’ve evolved!
